verses.verse: <S%G4253><s%> Now Before <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Feast <S%G1859><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Passover, <S%G3957><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Has Come <S%G2064><s%> His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Should Depart <S%G3327><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2889><s%> This World <S%G5127><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> Having Loved <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> His Own <S%G2398><s%> Which Were <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> To The <S%G1519><s%> End <S%G5056><s%> He Loved <S%G25><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Supper <S%G1173><s%> , Taking Place, <S%G1096><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Devil <S%G1228><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> Having Put <S%G906><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heart <S%G2588><s%> Of Judas, <S%G2455><s%> Simon's Son <S%G4613><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> , He Should Deliver Up, <S%G3860><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Has Given <S%G1325><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Into His <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hands, <S%G5495><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> From <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> He Came Out <S%G1831><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Goes, <S%G5217><s%>

He Rises <S%G1453><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Supper <S%G1173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lays Aside His <S%G5087><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Garments <S%G2440><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken <S%G2983><s%> A Towel <S%G3012><s%> He Girded <S%G1241><s%> Himself : <S%G1438><s%>

Afterwards <S%G1534><s%> He Pours <S%G906><s%> Water <S%G5204><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Washing Basin, <S%G3537><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Began <S%G756><s%> To Wash <S%G3538><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Feet <S%G4228><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples, <S%G3101><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Wipe Them <S%G1591><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Towel <S%G3012><s%> With Which <S%G3739><s%> He Was <S%G2258><s%> Girded. <S%G1241><s%>

He Comes <S%G2064><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> , He, <S%G1565><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Of Me <S%G3450><s%> Dost Wash <S%G3538><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Feet? <S%G4228><s%>

Answered <S%G611><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Do 4160 V-PAI-1S Thou 4771 P-2NS Not 3756 PRT-N Knowest 1492 V-RAI-2S Now, 737 ADV 1097 V-FDI-2S But Thou Shalt Know 1161 CONJ 3326 PREP Hereafter. 5023 D-APN

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Mayest Thou Wash <S%G3538><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> <S%G3450><s%> My Feet <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For Ever. <S%G165><s%> Answered <S%G611><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> <S%G1437><s%> Unless <S%G3361><s%> I Wash <S%G3538><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thou Hast Not <S%G2192><s%> Part <S%G3313><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Me. <S%G1700><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Washed <S%G3068><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Need <S%G5532><s%> Has Other <S%G2192><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Feet <S%G4228><s%> To Wash, <S%G3538><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Clean <S%G2513><s%> Wholly; <S%G3650><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Clean <S%G2513><s%> Are, <S%G2075><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Not <S%G3780><s%> All. <S%G3956><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> For He Knew <S%G1063><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Was Delivering Up <S%G3860><s%> Him : <S%G846><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> He Said, <S%G2036><s%> Not <S%G3780><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Clean <S%G2513><s%> Ye Are. <S%G2075><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> He Had Washed <S%G3538><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> Their Feet, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Taken <S%G2983><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2440><s%> His Garments, <S%G846><s%> Having Reclined <S%G377><s%> Again, <S%G3825><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G1097><s%> <S%G1097><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> I Have Done <S%G4160><s%> To You? <S%G5213><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Washed 3538 V-AAI-1S Your 5216 P-2GP 3588 T-APM Feet, 4228 N-APM The 3588 T-NSM Lord 2962 N-NSM And 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-NSM Teacher, 1320 N-NSM Also 2532 CONJ Ye 5210 P-2NP Ought 3784 V-PAI-2P Of One Another 240 C-GPM To Wash 3538 V-PAN The 3588 T-APM Feet; 4228 N-APM

<S%G5262><s%> For An Example <S%G1063><s%> I Gave <S%G1325><s%> You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Did 4160 V-AAI-1S To You, 5213 P-2DP Also 2532 CONJ Ye 5210 P-2NP Should Do. 4160 V-PAS-2P

Verily <S%G281><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not <S%G2076><s%> A Bondman <S%G1401><s%> Greater <S%G3187><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Than His Lord, <S%G846><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> A Messenger <S%G652><s%> Greater <S%G3187><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Than He Who Sent <S%G3992><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Ye Know, <S%G1492><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> Are Ye <S%G2075><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Ye Do <S%G4160><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> Of <S%G4012><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> I Speak. <S%G3004><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Know 1492 V-RAI-1S Whom 3739 R-APM I Chose, 1586 V-AMI-1S ' But 235 CONJ That 2443 CONJ The 3588 T-NSF Scripture 1124 N-NSF Might Be Fulfilled, 4137 V-APS-3S He That 3588 T-NSM Eats 5176 V-PAP-NSM ' With 3326 PREP Me 1700 P-1GS 3588 T-ASM Bread 740 N-ASM Lifted Up 1869 V-AAI-3S ' Against 1909 PREP Me 1691 P-1AS 3588 T-ASF 4418 N-ASF His Heel. 846 P-GSM

' <S%G575><s%> From This Time <S%G737><s%> I Tell <S%G3004><s%> You, <S%G5213><s%> Before <S%G4253><s%> <S%G3588><s%> It Comes To Pass, <S%G1096><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> It Come To Pass, <S%G1096><s%> Ye May Believe <S%G4100><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Am He. 1510 V-PXI-1S

Verily <S%G281><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Receives <S%G2983><s%> <S%G1437><s%> Whomsoever <S%G5100><s%> I Shall Send, <S%G3992><s%> Me <S%G1691><s%> Receives; <S%G2983><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And He That <S%G1161><s%> Me <S%G1691><s%> Receives, <S%G2983><s%> Receives <S%G2983><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Sent <S%G3992><s%> Me. <S%G3165><s%>

These Things <S%G5023><s%> Saying <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Was Troubled <S%G5015><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Testified <S%G3140><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> Will Deliver Up <S%G3860><s%> Me. <S%G3165><s%>

Looked <S%G991><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Upon <S%G1519><s%> One Another <S%G240><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Doubting <S%G639><s%> Of <S%G4012><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> He Speaks. <S%G3004><s%>

<S%G2258><s%> But There Was <S%G1161><s%> Reclining <S%G345><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> Of His Disciples <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bosom <S%G2859><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Loved <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Makes A Sign <S%G3506><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> To Him <S%G5129><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> To Ask <S%G4441><s%> <S%G5101><s%> Who <S%G302><s%> It Might Be <S%G1498><s%> Of <S%G4012><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> He Speaks. <S%G3004><s%>

Having Leaned <S%G1968><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> He <S%G1565><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Breast <S%G4738><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Is It? <S%G2076><s%>

Answers <S%G611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> He <S%G1565><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> To Whom <S%G3739><s%> I, <S%G1473><s%> Having Dipped <S%G911><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Morsel, <S%G5596><s%> Shall Give It. <S%G1929><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Dipped <S%G1686><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Morsel <S%G5596><s%> He Gives It <S%G1325><s%> To Judas, <S%G2455><s%> Simon's Son <S%G4613><s%> Iscariot. <S%G2469><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Morsel, <S%G5596><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Him <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Satan. <S%G4567><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> Thou Doest, <S%G4160><s%> Do <S%G4160><s%> Quickly. <S%G5032><s%>

<S%G5124><s%> But This <S%G1161><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Knew <S%G1097><s%> Of Those <S%G3588><s%> Reclining <S%G345><s%> <S%G4314><s%> Wherefore <S%G5101><s%> He Spoke <S%G2036><s%> To Him; <S%G846><s%>

<S%G5100><s%> For Some <S%G1063><s%> Thought, <S%G1380><s%> Since <S%G1893><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bag <S%G1101><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judas, <S%G2455><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Is Saying <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Buy <S%G59><s%> What Things <S%G3739><s%> Need Of <S%G5532><s%> We Have <S%G2192><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Feast; <S%G1859><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Poor <S%G4434><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Something <S%G5100><s%> He Should Give. <S%G1325><s%>

Having Received <S%G2983><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Morsel <S%G5596><s%> He <S%G1565><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Went Out; <S%G1831><s%> <S%G2258><s%> And It Was <S%G1161><s%> Night. <S%G3571><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> He Was Gone Out <S%G1831><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Has Been Glorified <S%G1392><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man, <S%G444><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Has Been Glorified <S%G1392><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Has Been Glorified <S%G1392><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Shall Glorify <S%G1392><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> , Himself, <S%G1438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2117><s%> Shall Glorify <S%G1392><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

Little Children, <S%G5040><s%> Yet <S%G2089><s%> A Little While <S%G3397><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> I Am. <S%G1510><s%> Ye Will Seek <S%G2212><s%> Me; <S%G3165><s%> And, <S%G2532><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> I Said <S%G2036><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> Go <S%G5217><s%> I, <S%G1473><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Are Not Able <S%G1410><s%> To Come, <S%G2064><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> Now. <S%G737><s%>

A Commandment <S%G1785><s%> New <S%G2537><s%> I Give <S%G1325><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye Should Love <S%G25><s%> One Another; <S%G240><s%> According As <S%G2531><s%> I Loved <S%G25><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Should Love <S%G25><s%> One Another. <S%G240><s%>

By <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> Shall Know <S%G1097><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> To Me <S%G1698><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> Ye Are, <S%G2075><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Ye Have <S%G2192><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> One Another. <S%G240><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> Goest Thou? <S%G5217><s%> Answered <S%G611><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> I Go <S%G5217><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thou Art Not Able <S%G1410><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> To Follow, <S%G190><s%> <S%G5305><s%> But Afterwards <S%G1161><s%> Thou Shalt Follow <S%G190><s%> Me. <S%G3427><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> <S%G1223><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Am I Not Able <S%G1410><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> To Follow <S%G190><s%> Now? <S%G737><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Life <S%G5590><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Thee <S%G4675><s%> I Will Lay Down. <S%G5087><s%>
